author: rick horocholyn
comment: I hate reverse onus offers. I don't want a free trial period to automatically charge me at the end of the trial. If I find after the trial that I didn't find it useful then I shouldn't have to begin paying. Instead, the vendor should ask me if I want to continue or not. Accordingly, I've attempted to cancel, yet this attempt has been blocked on my new pixel 2. No idea why, but that's another issue...

author: Brett Dee
comment: I rarely write reviews but thought this app warranted it. I used to use a similar app called Worldmate so that's my benchmark. Comparatively, TripCase is just not intuitive whatsoever. After forwarding through email confirmations it rarely picks up hotels and it also doubles up on travel confirmations (say if there are 2 of you travelling, or if you have sent a confirmation through twice accidentally). The reason I give it 2 stars not 1, is because it does look nice and the realtime flight data is available and seemingly free.  Recommend just spending some decent effort on making it way more intuitive and linking into Google's accommodation database and I'll reconsider using it.

author: Dave Beggs
comment: Just not a very clever! Great for flight information , but pretty useless when it comes to other aspects of trip planing.  No possibility of attaching a document, say pdf confirmation, and no means to share itineraries via WhatsApp and other social media, only via email, which requires recipient to join Tripcase to view.  Not recommended for anything other than the most basic of planning.

author: Dave Thomas
comment: Sent duplicate alerts... Hard to read had to get past their ads for upgrades to find my travel info. Airline and hotel apps far superior.

author: dominic romano
comment: This app was so good once.... now it's just gone to garbage. What a shame. Uninstall and get TripIt instead.

author: Rob Scott
comment: Dear Tripcase, PLEASE PLEASE change the way this app works when travelling. It is useless and not fit for purpose "as-is". It's an easy change - FIRST, load the itinerary as it is in the buffer/storage. THEN, check for updates on the Internet. What always happens is I'm standing at the immigration desk and when they ask me what hotel I'm staying at, or what flight I'm departing on, I have to stand there like an idiot for minutes while the app tries to update the itinerary (hint, I'm travelling so probably don't have Internet). Just load what you have and THEN in the background go ahead and try to update. The only way to make it work is to stay in flight mode.

author: Craig Stevens
comment: Have used it gor a few years but it's getting harder to use and so unreliable. Have wasted so much time today so will ditch it and use something that works intuitively and doesn't waste precious time.

author: Nelson Eulalio
comment: Great design but lots of glitches. Easy to add flights from booking number but impossible to ad a PLANNED flight which there is no booking. (if you want to put a flight place holder between 2 cities that you haven't bought yet, you can't). Also I can't delete double bookings from a mistake. You also can't add a place holder car trip between 2 cities unless you have booked through a rental car company. This app unfortunately IS NOT a travel PLANNER. It is a booking organiser.

author: Lauryn Markle
comment: Really great and helpful while traveling but its having a lot of glitches right now. Isnt pulling the right information on my upcoming flights and won't let me delete reservations

author: Milton Leung
comment: The OCR vastly needs improvement. The itinerary sent usually returns the wrong origin and destination of flights such that I had to edit them myself.

author: Gareth Vance
comment: It's ok. You can manually log everything that you intend to do but it doesn't sync emails that you forward on to it. Therefore you can have the itinerary in one place but there's time involved in inputting it

author: Slávek Trávníček
comment: It doesn't show all of my upcoming trips, only one. Wrong location of the bus station on the map (different continent, lol).

author: Marie Kanealii-Ortiz
comment: I love that it updates me on gates and delays prior reaching the airport.  I'm notified faster than the actual airline. Thank you

author: James Sowden
comment: This app is appalling. It doesn't ask for confirmation of your password when you sign up. I made a mistake in my password and now can't access my own account. Stupid. Going to a competitor.

author: Jeremy Win
comment: I use this app every time I travel It keeps the itinary well. There are a few points that dont work. Bu overall its good.

Continual problems makes this apt frustrating.Monitoring of this apt is very poor with no after hours help.Too bad if your a businessman and use the apt daily.Good concept but poorly maintained.You need to up your game inventor.P.S.I agree with alot of the negitive remarks made previously.

author: Kevin Robinson
comment: They are not able to populate all the addresses that I try to input. Google Trips works better.

author: Nikolai Ch
comment: Wants access to all contacts, i don't like that. And doesn't work if access is not given

author: Lucas Catardo
comment: O aplicativo estava ótimo até eu começar usar com frequência. O app demora horrores para se conectar na internet, não carrega nada, fica dando erro dizendo que está sem conexão com a TripCase.

author: Chris Campton
comment: Recently consistently making errors from what i sent in to what shows up on my Tripcase. Plan to uninstall.

author: S F
comment: Many mistakes on my trips. I'm going to uninstall.

author: Amanda Lim
comment: Could be improved by adding: Merge and unmerged. I don't think the overlap trips working.

author: Elaine Mong
comment: It was once a good app but the app cannot find the flights I booked, even with the booking reference.

author: yong chee hao
comment: giving an option to manually pin the location on map will be great

author: Rich Jones
comment: Very useful app when traveling for work. It updates you when flight time changes. Very  organized itineraries.

author: Wanda Ritchie
comment: Used to love it, now doesn't link airline reservations

author: Kieren Baillie
comment: Need to add the ability to edit trips rather than just deleting them and starting over.

author: Jade Bone
comment: Keeps crashing. Fustrating

author: Francis Zammit
comment: Keeps me up to date with flight details. Great app for frequent travellers.

author: Ricardo Ribeiro
comment: Strict and stiff app

author: Stefan Mihai Stanescu
comment: Why does it need to access my contacts????

author: Nir Melamoud
comment: great, but missing a widget... build a widget is not that hard..

author: Chaudhry Shakoor
comment: Great app! Very useful. Works perfect!

author: Metin Yaşar
comment: Had better if you add witgets on it.

author: Harvey Reed
comment: Good basic travel itinerary

author: Christopher Rezabek
comment: LOVE this app!

author: Phuong Cao Minh
comment: Wonderful is all!

author: Yogesh Patel
comment: Nice app

author: Abdul Moiz
comment: Awesome

author: Cung Nguyen
comment: Awesome
